message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $15000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $18000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $18000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal possible, but I'm starting to get a little concerned that we're getting too far apart. I can offer it to you for $17000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $16500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I've given it some more thought, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $16250. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're interested, this is your last chance to make a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I've reached my limit of concessions. I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer of $16250. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. I'm still open to negotiations, but I need to see some movement from your side.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to pay $15800 for the product. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $10000.
